Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.network

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.network.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Server class. This class menages all the aspectes for connections, disconnections, reconnections, and creating games.

  • Method Details

    • findName

      public boolean findName​(java.lang.String playerName, int listIndex)
      Method that finds a player in a DefaultRoom for public game
      Parameters:
      playerName -
      listIndex -
      Returns:
      true if it finds the name in the specified defaultRoom (form 1 to 4)

    • findRoom

      public boolean findRoom​(java.lang.String name)
      Tries to find the room by its name in all room's list.
      Parameters:
      name -
      Returns:
      true if it finds the room in the list of rooms or active rooms

    • findActiveRoom

      public boolean findActiveRoom​(java.lang.String name)
      Tries to find the room by its name in the active room list.
      Parameters:
      name -
      Returns:
      true if it finds the room in the active list

    • lobby

      public void lobby​(ClientConnection c, java.lang.String name, int numofplayer)
      Methods that menage the connection of a public game. It puts a player into the specified default room. If the room is full creates a new room with a never used name and copys the content in the new Room, then starts the game.
      Parameters:
      c -
      name -
      numofplayer -
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if number of players one wants to play with is not in the range 1-4

    • startGame

      public void startGame​(Room room)
      Methods that instances the game with its network structure. Gets the players from the room and creates their Views. Then populate the game, create a controller, adds the oberservers and sends the initial message.
      Parameters:
      room -
